Interface Menu

public interface Menu

  • Method Details

    • getMenuID

      int getMenuID()
      Get the unique identifier for this menu
      Returns:
      the integer value of this Menu's identifier

    • getDishList

      ArrayList<Dish> getDishList()
      Get the full list of dishes that are part of this menu
      Returns:
      the HashSet of all Dish objects contained in this Menu

    • getCourses

      ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
      Get the list of courses that are part of this menu
      Returns:
      the HashSet of Course objects contained in this Menu

    • getWinePairings

      HashMap<Dish,Wine> getWinePairings()
      Get the wine pairings for the dishes in this menu
      Returns:
      the HashMap of Dish objects to paired Wine objects
